resources.string: This privacy policy governs your use of the software application StraightDrive for mobile devices that was created by the developer KoolBots. StraightDrive app is perfect for keeping score while you are enjoying StraightDrive Cricket Tabletop game. Learn more at https://www.koolbots.com

We do not collect any personal data other than the device id to collect statistics of the games played. If you like us to delete the user provided data that you have provided via the application, please contact us at support@koolbots.com
You can stop all collection of information by the application easily by uninstalling the app. You may use the standard uninstall process as may be available as part of your mobile device

If you have any questions regarding privacy while using the StraightDrive app or StraightDrive Cricket game, you can learn more details at https://www.koolbots.com or can contact us via email at support@koolbots.com
